Description: SugarCRM enables businesses to create extraordinary customer relationships with the most innovative and affordable CRM solution in the market.
Name: SugarCRM

Methods.Name: List Custom Object's Related Records
Methods.Description: Retrieves records related to an instance of a custom object, in accordance with the specified Link.

Methods.Name: List Contact's Related Records
Methods.Description: Retrieves records related to a contact, in accordance with the specified Link.

Methods.Name: Search Opportunities
Methods.Description: Gets opportunities that match the provided filter(s).

Methods.Name: List Opportunity Lines
Methods.Description: Lists all opportunity lines for the specified opportunity from SugarCRM.

Methods.Name: Update Opportunity
Methods.Description: Update an existing opportunity in SuagrCRM.

Methods.Name: List Opportunities
Methods.Description: List all opportunities from SugarCRM.

Methods.Name: Get New Opportunities
Methods.Description: Gets new opportunities from SugarCRM since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get Opportunity
Methods.Description: Gets a specified opportunity from SugarCRM.

Methods.Name: Delete Opportunity
Methods.Description: Deletes a specified opportunity.

Methods.Name: Get New And Updated Opportunities
Methods.Description: Gets new and updated opportunities from SugarCRM since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Create Opportunity
Methods.Description: Create a new opportunity in SuagrCRM.

Methods.Name: List Calls
Methods.Description: Lists all calls.

Methods.Name: List New And Updated Calls
Methods.Description: Lists all calls created or updated since the last run time.

Methods.Description: Gets a specified call.

Methods.Name: List Updated Calls
Methods.Description: Lists all calls updated since the last run time.

Methods.Name: List New Calls
Methods.Description: Lists all calls created since the last run time.

Methods.Name: List Activities By Opportunity
Methods.Description: Lists the specified opportunity's activities from SugarCRM.

Methods.Description: This method gets contacts that have at least one email address. For each email address, a separate contact is returned.

MetaDescription: Keep your customer data organised and up to date with SugarCRM automation workflows that integrate with your favourite apps.
